name: Caprese Fresh Bowl
description: A refreshing Italian-inspired mix of crisp spinach, cherry tomatoes, creamy mozzarella balls, and fresh basil. Served with a balsamic vinaigrette on the side for the perfect finishing touch.
allergen: Contains milk (mozzarella). May contain traces of nuts (produced in a facility handling nuts).

name: Classic Caesar Fresh Bowl
description: A timeless favourite made with crunchy romaine lettuce, grilled chicken breast, golden croutons, and parmesan cheese. Comes with a creamy Caesar dressing to tie it all together.

name: Pecan Chicken Fresh Bowl
description: A hearty and flavourful salad featuring baby spinach, grilled chicken, sweetcorn, tangy blue cheese, and toasted pecans. Served with ranch dressing for a rich, savoury bite.
